resources.string: MyZakat Gold was developed by Nurul Jannah Binti Saadat and Masturina Binti azmi. MyZakat Gold helps users to make it easier for them to calculate the amount of gold zakat that will be charged in a certain amount. The app is built solely to give users an estimate of the value that may be charged.
